stories.text: Engineer here "doing well" with software contracting business. Making "big money" relative to my peers and family. I am getting comfortable and that is making me uncomfortable. I am not reading as much and I am not hungry to do more. Is this mantra that "you are the product of the 5 people you hangout with" really true? How do you escape this bubble if making friends is really hard for you. am I just fucked?
stories.title: Ask HN: How to Not to Give Up

stories.text:
I was watching the NBA finals game tonight and noticed the text "fiserv.forum" on the court, so I went typed that into a browser. The site is owned by some software developer named Diego advertising his services, but https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fiserv_Forum claims that it's just the stylized version of the name of the arena in Milwaukee.

I guess they didn't think .forum was a valid TLD? Anyways, kudos Diego.
stories.title: Who Owns Fiserv.forum?
Women’s Handball Players Are Fined for Rejecting Bikini Uniforms
